segments.content: Cyril and Matthieu from Theodo Apps here 👋, standing in for Seb to bring you the latest news from React and React Native!
segments.sourceMdx: Cyril and Matthieu from Theodo Apps here 👋, standing in for Seb to bring you the latest news from React and React Native!
segments.translated_content: 我们是来自Theodo Apps的Cyril和Matthieu 👋，暂代Seb为大家带来React和React Native的最新动态！

segments.content: The previous edition was last Friday, so this one will be a bit shorter than usual. We’re resuming the usual pace of one newsletter every week after the holidays.
segments.sourceMdx: The previous edition was last Friday, so this one will be a bit shorter than usual. We’re resuming the usual pace of one newsletter every week after the holidays.
segments.translated_content: 由于上期通讯发布于上周五，本期内容会较往常稍短。假期结束后，我们将恢复每周一期的常规更新节奏。

segments.content: The [2024 edition of JS rising stars](https://risingstars.js.org/2024/en) is out, you can start by having a look at which libraries performed well on this flawed but still useful metric of GitHub starts. Spoiler: `shadcn/ui` gained the most stars (again). Sébastien commented the [Tooling section](https://risingstars.js.org/2024/en#section-build).
segments.sourceMdx: The [2024 edition of JS rising stars](https://risingstars.js.org/2024/en) is out, you can start by having a look at which libraries performed well on this flawed but still useful metric of GitHub starts. Spoiler: `shadcn/ui` gained the most stars (again). Sébastien commented the [Tooling section](https://risingstars.js.org/2024/en#section-build).
segments.translated_content: [2024年度JS明星项目榜单](https://risingstars.js.org/2024/en)已发布，您可以通过这个虽不完美但仍具参考价值的GitHub星标指标了解哪些库表现突出。剧透预警：`shadcn/ui`再次成为星标增长冠军。Sébastien特别点评了[工具链板块](https://risingstars.js.org/2024/en#section-build)。

segments.content: Make sure to check our partner 🗓️ [Paris TypeScript La Conf'](https://la-conf.typescript.paris/?utm_source=thisweekinreact) - 🇫🇷 Paris - 28 February - Full speaker line up just dropped! Join Mateusz Burzyński, Elise Patrikainen and David Rousset! Get 20% off tickets with code "TWIR"!
segments.sourceMdx: Make sure to check our partner 🗓️ [Paris TypeScript La Conf'](https://la-conf.typescript.paris/?utm_source=thisweekinreact) - 🇫🇷 Paris - 28 February - Full speaker line up just dropped! Join Mateusz Burzyński, Elise Patrikainen and David Rousset! Get 20% off tickets with code "TWIR"!
segments.translated_content: 不要错过我们的合作伙伴活动 🗓️ [巴黎TypeScript大会](https://la-conf.typescript.paris/?utm_source=thisweekinreact) - 🇫🇷 2月28日巴黎举行 - 完整演讲阵容刚刚公布！Mateusz Burzyński、Elise Patrikainen和David Rousset将联袂登场！使用优惠码"TWIR"可享门票8折！

segments.content: If your authentication isn't **helping you grow**, it's **holding you back**.
segments.sourceMdx: If your authentication isn't **helping you grow**, it's **holding you back**.
segments.translated_content: 如果您的认证系统不能**助力业务增长**，那它就是在**拖后腿**。

segments.content: With [PropelAuth](https://www.propelauth.com/?utm_source=newsletter\&utm_campaign=twinrjan82024), you get everything you need to launch and scale your B2B product:
segments.sourceMdx: With [PropelAuth](https://www.propelauth.com/?utm_source=newsletter&utm_campaign=twinrjan82024), you get everything you need to launch and scale your B2B product:
segments.translated_content: [PropelAuth](https://www.propelauth.com/?utm_source=newsletter&utm_campaign=twinrjan82024)为您提供B2B产品从启动到规模化所需的一切：

segments.content:
* **Easy to understand** [documentation](https://docs.propelauth.com/?utm_source=newsletter\&utm_campaign=twinrjan82024) and **friendly, fast support**.
* **UIs that cover all your use cases** - signup, login, MFA, organization management and more.
* **User impersonation** so you can provide top-notch support to your users.
* **Enterprise SAML/SSO** and **advanced security features** so you can be upmarket-ready.
* **User insights** to help you strategize and expand.
segments.sourceMdx:
- **Easy to understand** [documentation](https://docs.propelauth.com/?utm_source=newsletter&utm_campaign=twinrjan82024) and **friendly, fast support**.
- **UIs that cover all your use cases** - signup, login, MFA, organization management and more.
- **User impersonation** so you can provide top-notch support to your users.
- **Enterprise SAML/SSO** and **advanced security features** so you can be upmarket-ready.
- **User insights** to help you strategize and expand.
segments.translated_content:
- **清晰易懂**的[文档](https://docs.propelauth.com/?utm_source=newsletter&utm_campaign=twinrjan82024)和**高效友好的技术支持**
- **覆盖全场景的UI组件**——注册登录、多因素认证、组织管理等
- **用户模拟功能**助您提供顶级客户支持
- **企业级SAML/SSO**和**高级安全特性**满足高端市场需求
- **用户行为洞察**辅助战略决策与业务拓展

segments.content: Explains what Next.js is trying to accomplish, and why `”use cache”` is a compiler directive and not a function (to be able to analyze closures and determine the right cache key).
segments.sourceMdx: Explains what Next.js is trying to accomplish, and why `”use cache”` is a compiler directive and not a function (to be able to analyze closures and determine the right cache key).
segments.translated_content: 阐释了Next.js的设计目标，以及为何"use cache"采用编译器指令而非函数形式（以便分析闭包并确定正确的缓存键）。

segments.content: React is adding support for View transitions with a `<ViewTransition />` component that integrates with all the async features like Suspense and `startTransition`.
segments.sourceMdx: React is adding support for View transitions with a `<ViewTransition />` component that integrates with all the async features like Suspense and `startTransition`.
segments.translated_content: React正通过`<ViewTransition />`组件原生支持视图过渡动画，该组件可与Suspense、`startTransition`等异步特性深度集成。

segments.content:
* 💸 [daily.dev: Your personal dev news feed. Free!](https://daily.dev/w/this-week-in-react)
* 🐦 [Recoil (state manager by meta) has been archived](https://x.com/dai_shi/status/1875910305802514649)
* 📜 [RSC and Server Action Bundle Practice](https://github.com/orgs/web-infra-dev/discussions/23): An Rspack maintainer shared a comprehensive deep dive on how bundlers implement React Server Components in practice, notably webpack and Turbopack.
* 📜 [Automated Accessibility Testing at Slack](https://slack.engineering/automated-accessibility-testing-at-slack/): They tried to do it with testing-library but ended up using Playwright.
* 📜 [Thoughts on State Management Libraries in the React Compiler Era](https://blog.axlight.com/posts/thoughts-on-state-management-libraries-in-the-react-compiler-era/): The compiler makes React Context much more attractive, are they still useful?
* 📜 [All kinds of state management in React](https://www.typeonce.dev/article/all-kinds-of-state-management-in-react): url state, server state, client state…
* 📜 [React Router 7 Tutorial](https://www.robinwieruch.de/react-router/): A 3-part series covering the introduction, descendent routes and search params.
* 📜 [How React's Render, Effects and Refs work under the hood](https://tigerabrodi.blog/how-reacts-render-effects-and-refs-work-under-the-hood)
* 📜 [Redux Saga Is Hard Until You Look Under The Hood](https://janhesters.com/blog/redux-saga-is-hard-until-you-look-under-the-hood)
* 📦 [Bippy - A toolkit to hack into react internals](https://www.bippy.dev/): It’s what [react-scan](https://github.com/aidenybai/react-scan) uses under the hood to access the Fiber tree.
* 📦 [Docusaurus 3.7](https://docusaurus.io/blog/releases/3.7) adds support for React 19 and a new svgr plugin.
* 📦 [React Admin 5.4 (and 5.3)](https://marmelab.com/blog/2025/01/08/react-admin-january-2025-update.html)
* 🎥 [Cosden - The Biggest Mistake Intermediate React Developers Make](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jqcbIgQBn34)
* 🎥 [Alem Tuzlak - The Benefits of React Router V7 Nobody Told You About](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EGuYKL8puRI)
* 🎥 [Theo - Inertia 2.0: It's like Next but better (and you can use React!)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OpXLWJd2iO0)
* 🎙️ [Syntax.fm - 2025 Web Development Predictions](https://syntax.fm/show/866/2025-web-development-predictions)

segments.translated_content:
- 💸 [daily.dev：您的个人开发者资讯聚合平台，免费！](https://daily.dev/w/this-week-in-react)
- 🐦 [Meta状态管理库Recoil已被归档](https://x.com/dai_shi/status/1875910305802514649)
- 📜 [RSC与Server Action打包实践](https://github.com/orgs/web-infra-dev/discussions/23)：Rspack维护者深度解析了webpack和Turbopack如何实现React服务端组件的技术细节。
- 📜 [Slack的自动化无障碍测试实践](https://slack.engineering/automated-accessibility-testing-at-slack/)：尝试使用testing-library后最终转向Playwright方案。
- 📜 [React编译器时代的状态管理库思考](https://blog.axlight.com/posts/thoughts-on-state-management-libraries-in-the-react-compiler-era/)：编译器使React Context更具吸引力，第三方状态库是否仍有必要？
- 📜 [React中的全场景状态管理](https://www.typeonce.dev/article/all-kinds-of-state-management-in-react)：URL状态、服务端状态、客户端状态...
- 📜 [React Router 7教程](https://www.robinwieruch.de/react-router/)：三篇系列教程涵盖基础用法、嵌套路由和搜索参数。
- 📜 [React渲染机制、副作用与Ref底层原理](https://tigerabrodi.blog/how-reacts-render-effects-and-refs-work-under-the-hood)
- 📜 [Redux Saga原理揭秘：看似复杂实则简单](https://janhesters.com/blog/redux-saga-is-hard-until-you-look-under-the-hood)
- 📦 [Bippy - React内部机制调试工具包](https://www.bippy.dev/)：[react-scan](https://github.com/aidenybai/react-scan)底层使用的Fiber树探查工具。
- 📦 [Docusaurus 3.7发布](https://docusaurus.io/blog/releases/3.7)支持React 19并新增svgr插件。
- 📦 [React Admin 5.4（及5.3）更新](https://marmelab.com/blog/2025/01/08/react-admin-january-2025-update.html)
- 🎥 [Cosden - 中级React开发者最常犯的错误](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jqcbIgQBn34)
- 🎥 [Alem Tuzlak - React Router V7不为人知的优势](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EGuYKL8puRI)
- 🎥 [Theo - Inertia 2.0：比Next更优的React全栈方案](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OpXLWJd2iO0)
- 🎙️ [Syntax.fm - 2025年Web开发趋势预测](https://syntax.fm/show/866/2025-web-development-predictions)

segments.content: Reactile is an UI/UX turnkey framework which features an out-of-the-box, intuitive tiling display with workspaces. It encourages parallel workloads for large web solutions within a single browser tab. Implement your own view containers, widgets and logic using React and let Reactile handle the display for you.
segments.sourceMdx: Reactile is an UI/UX turnkey framework which features an out-of-the-box, intuitive tiling display with workspaces. It encourages parallel workloads for large web solutions within a single browser tab. Implement your own view containers, widgets and logic using React and let Reactile handle the display for you.
segments.translated_content: Reactile是开箱即用的UI/UX框架，提供直观的平铺式工作区布局。专为大型Web解决方案设计，支持在单个浏览器标签页内实现并行工作流。开发者只需用React实现自定义视图容器和组件，布局交予Reactile处理。

segments.content: On top of that, Reactile also offers:
segments.sourceMdx: On top of that, Reactile also offers:

segments.content:
* A promise-based persistence mechanism which permits a uniform workflow across time and on multiple devices.
* The possibility to use nested tabs for your tiles.
* A simplified global search mechanism.
* CSS @container based responsiveness.
* And much more.
segments.sourceMdx:
- A promise-based persistence mechanism which permits a uniform workflow across time and on multiple devices.
- The possibility to use nested tabs for your tiles.
- A simplified global search mechanism.
- CSS @container based responsiveness.
- And much more.
segments.translated_content:
- 基于Promise的持久化机制，实现跨设备跨时段工作流统一
- 支持嵌套标签页的平铺布局
- 简化的全局搜索功能
- 基于CSS @container的响应式设计
- 更多特性待您探索

segments.content: Version 2 coming out soon. Get started with your unique 30-day free trial. Learn more about it on reactile.net.
segments.sourceMdx: Version 2 coming out soon. Get started with your unique 30-day free trial. Learn more about it on reactile.net.
segments.translated_content: 2.0版本即将发布，立即注册享受30天免费试用。[reactile.net](https://www.reactile.net/)了解更多详情。

segments.content:
* 💸 [PostHog - How to set up React Native session replay](https://dub.link/twir-jan8)
* 🐦 [Nitro Views will be released along with React Native 0.78](https://x.com/mrousavy/status/1876559810784833930)
* 🐦 [Network debugging tools will land in Radon IDE](https://x.com/kzzzf/status/1875211071231025353)
* 👀 [React Native PR - Static Hermes for React Native](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/pull/48531): The integration of the new Hermes implementation has started! The initial benchmarks shows a great 30%+ perf improvement, but it's not even using typed code or JIT yet, which should give even more significant numbers.
* 📖 [You can highlight live re-renders in React Native DevTools](https://reactnative.dev/docs/react-native-devtools#react-components)
* 📜 [Modern SQLite for React Native apps - DrizzleORM with expo-sqlite setup, type-safe queries, live queries, migrations, Drizzle Studio Expo Dev Tool Plugin.](https://expo.dev/blog/modern-sqlite-for-react-native-apps)
* 📦 [React Native 0.77.0-rc.6](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/releases/tag/v0.77.0-rc.6) is the golden RC and a stable release is scheduled for next week.
* 📦 [React Native Edge to Edge 1.2](https://github.com/zoontek/react-native-edge-to-edge/releases/tag/1.2.0) adds support for light theme variants on android.
* 🎥 [React Universe On Air 45 - Evan Bacon on Universal React Native Apps, DOM & React Server Components](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rA7E3rGKSZw)
segments.sourceMdx:
- 💸 [PostHog - How to set up React Native session replay](https://dub.link/twir-jan8)
- 🐦 [Nitro Views will be released along with React Native 0.78](https://x.com/mrousavy/status/1876559810784833930)
- 🐦 [Network debugging tools will land in Radon IDE](https://x.com/kzzzf/status/1875211071231025353)
- 👀 [React Native PR - Static Hermes for React Native](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/pull/48531): The integration of the new Hermes implementation has started! The initial benchmarks shows a great 30%+ perf improvement, but it's not even using typed code or JIT yet, which should give even more significant numbers.
- 📖 [You can highlight live re-renders in React Native DevTools](https://reactnative.dev/docs/react-native-devtools#react-components)
- 📜 [Modern SQLite for React Native apps - DrizzleORM with expo-sqlite setup, type-safe queries, live queries, migrations, Drizzle Studio Expo Dev Tool Plugin.](https://expo.dev/blog/modern-sqlite-for-react-native-apps)
- 📦 [React Native 0.77.0-rc.6](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/releases/tag/v0.77.0-rc.6) is the golden RC and a stable release is scheduled for next week.
- 📦 [React Native Edge to Edge 1.2](https://github.com/zoontek/react-native-edge-to-edge/releases/tag/1.2.0) adds support for light theme variants on android.
- 🎥 [React Universe On Air 45 - Evan Bacon on Universal React Native Apps, DOM & React Server Components](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rA7E3rGKSZw)
segments.translated_content:
- 💸 [PostHog - 如何设置React Native会话回放](https://dub.link/twir-jan8)
- 🐦 [Nitro视图将随React Native 0.78同步发布](https://x.com/mrousavy/status/1876559810784833930)
- 🐦 [网络调试工具即将登陆Radon IDE](https://x.com/kzzzf/status/1875211071231025353)
- 👀 [React Native PR - 静态Hermes支持](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/pull/48531)：新Hermes实现已开始集成！初步基准测试显示30%+的性能提升，且尚未启用类型化代码和JIT编译，预计会有更大提升空间。
- 📖 [React Native开发者工具现已支持实时高亮重渲染组件](https://reactnative.dev/docs/react-native-devtools#react-components)
- 📜 [现代SQLite在React Native应用中的应用指南 - 使用DrizzleORM与expo-sqlite配置类型安全查询、实时查询、迁移及Drizzle Studio Expo开发工具插件](https://expo.dev/blog/modern-sqlite-for-react-native-apps)
- 📦 [React Native 0.77.0-rc.6](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/releases/tag/v0.77.0-rc.6) 已进入最终候选阶段，稳定版计划下周发布。
- 📦 [React Native Edge to Edge 1.2](https://github.com/zoontek/react-native-edge-to-edge/releases/tag/1.2.0) 新增Android浅色主题变体支持。
- 🎥 [React Universe On Air 45 - Evan Bacon谈通用React Native应用、DOM与React服务端组件](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rA7E3rGKSZw)

segments.content:
* 📜 [JavaScript Frameworks - Heading into 2025](https://dev.to/this-is-learning/javascript-frameworks-heading-into-2025-hkb)
* 📜 [The future of htmx](https://htmx.org/essays/future/): (almost) no new features
* 📜 [Relatively New Things You Should Know about HTML Heading Into 2025](https://frontendmasters.com/blog/bone-up-html-2025/)
* 📜 [Testing Accessibility with Screen Readers](https://www.epicweb.dev/testing-accessibility-with-screen-readers)
* 📜 [Balancing Text In CSS](https://ishadeed.com/article/balancing-text-css/)
* 📜 [Using Forced Reflows, the Event Loop, and the Repaint Cycle to Slide Open a Box](https://macarthur.me/posts/box/)
* 📜 [Node’s new built-in support for TypeScript](https://2ality.com/2025/01/nodejs-strip-type.html)
* 📦 [Node 23.6](https://nodejs.org/en/blog/release/v23.6.0) with TS types stripping, and [Node 22.13 (LTS)](https://nodejs.org/en/blog/release/v22.13.0) with stable security model.
* 📦 [pnpm 10.0 - Increased security, `onlyBuiltDependencies`](https://github.com/pnpm/pnpm/releases/tag/v10.0.0)
* 📦 [Prisma 6.2 - omit, SQLite json/enum fields](https://github.com/prisma/prisma/releases/tag/6.2.0)

- 📦 [Prisma 6.2 - omit, SQLite json/enum fields](https://github.com/prisma/prisma/releases/tag/6.2.0)
